parametersDescriptions.listboxId: Id of the listbox element within the Menu.
parametersDescriptions.listboxRef: Ref of the listbox DOM element within the Menu.
parametersDescriptions.onClose: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed. Typically onClose is used to set state in the parent component, which is used to control the Menu open prop.

returnValueDescriptions.contextValue: The value for the menu context.
returnValueDescriptions.getListboxProps: Resolver for the listbox component's props.
returnValueDescriptions.highlightedOption: The highlighted option in the menu listbox.
returnValueDescriptions.highlightFirstItem: Callback for highlighting the first item in the menu listbox.
returnValueDescriptions.highlightLastItem: Callback for highlighting the last item in the menu listbox.
